name: Project Firelilly: Official Horror Game
description:

Description :

Welcome to Project Firelilly!

A creepy short game where you play as a girl named lilly!

You and your friends will meet up one night at the park, however, they end up being taken away before you are here.

Play a 30m-1 hour exprience with creepy and unique mechanics!

Enjoy!

easter eggs and creepy death screens
